sentences.en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
sentences.cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

sentences.en: An added complication is the growing concern for the environment.
sentences.cn: 还有个问题就是对环境的日益关注。

sentences.en: Doctors I came into contact with voiced their concern.
sentences.cn: 我接触到的医生都表示了他们的担心。

sentences.en: drama seemed to have no concern with ‘truth’ at all.
sentences.cn: 戏剧似乎与“事实”毫无关系。

sentences.en: He expressed concern that the ship might be in distress.
sentences.cn: 他担心船可能会遇险。

sentences.en: He had only gone along out of concern for his two grandsons.
sentences.cn: 他完全是出于对两个孙子的关心才继续这样做。

sentences.en: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.cn: 她明显的关心使他感动。

sentences.en: His main concern is to be able to provide for his family.
sentences.cn: 他最为关心的事就是能够养家。

sentences.en: I didn't concern myself with politics.
sentences.cn: 我不关心政治。

sentences.en: I think your concern is misplaced. Ackroyd is no threat to anyone.
sentences.cn: 我认为你多虑了，阿克罗伊德不会对任何人构成威胁。

sentences.en: In her last days the poet expressed concern for her father.
sentences.cn: 在生命最后的日子里，诗人表达了她对父亲的关切。

sentences.en: Issues like food additives do concern me.
sentences.cn: 食品添加剂这类事情确实使我很担心。

sentences.en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentences.cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentences.en: One of the concerns that people have is the side effects of treatment.
sentences.cn: 人们担心的问题之一是治疗的副作用。

sentences.en: Oryx is a Dallas-based oil and gas exploration and production concern.
sentences.cn: 奥瑞克斯是一家设在达拉斯的石油和天然气勘探生产公司。

sentences.en: The growing number of people seeking refuge in Thailand is beginning to concern Western aid agencies.
sentences.cn: 日益增多的到泰国寻求避难的人数开始让西方援助机构感到担忧。

sentences.en: the measures are irrelevant as far as inflation is concerned.
sentences.cn: 就通货膨胀而言，这些措施无关紧要。

sentences.en: The move follows growing public concern over the spread of the disease.
sentences.cn: 针对公众对该疾病的不断蔓延日益担忧，从而出台了这一举措。

sentences.en: The noise would have provoked alarm and neighbourly concern.
sentences.cn: 吵闹本会引起担忧和好意的关注。

sentences.en: The recent rise in crime is a matter of considerable public concern.
sentences.cn: 近来犯罪增多是民众极为关切的事。

sentences.en: The report concerns the drug traffic on the Mexican-US border.
sentences.cn: 这篇报告讲的是墨西哥和美国边境的毒品交易。

sentences.en: The restaurant is a family concern.
sentences.cn: 这家餐馆是一个家族企业。

sentences.en: The survey's findings are a matter of great concern.
sentences.cn: 这次调查的结果备受关注。

sentences.en: The technical aspects were the concern of the Army.
sentences.cn: 技术方面由陆军负责。

sentences.en: There is a concern about replenish-ment of the population.
sentences.cn: 有人担心人口的补充问题。

sentences.en: There is worldwide concern about the destruction of the rainforests.
sentences.cn: 全世界都在关注热带雨林遭到破坏的问题。

sentences.en: This study concerns couples’ expectations of marriage.
sentences.cn: 这项研究是关于夫妻对婚姻的期望。

sentences.en: Today's organic wine producer is typically a small, quality-conscious family concern.
sentences.cn: 现今的有机葡萄酒生产商一般是注重品质的小型家族企业.

words.tran_cn: 担心地；关心公众事务地
关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关

phrases.phrase: as (或 so) far as —— is concerned

phrases.tran_cn: 对…表示担心/忧虑；使（自己）关心…
◎从事,忙于(常与with, about, in, over连用)
adj. 干预；从事（参与；从事参与）；干涉
敬启者（读者身份不明时用在信件、通知和证明书开头的套语）

trans.tran_cn: 所关切的事；企业；关心v影响,涉及,关心
trans.tran_en: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

trans.tran_cn: 担心，令人担心的事，关心（的事），分内之事，公司
trans.tran_en: something that is important to you or that involves you

trans.tran_cn: 影响，涉及，使担忧，关心，对…感兴趣，认为…重要
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel worried or upset
something that is important to you or that involves you

trans.tran_cn: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
trans.tran_en: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them
